name: Alio
description: Alio is a short 2D rougelike  game, where you rush from room to room defeating enemies and exploring a world. It was made for the GamesPlusJames Jam2019, with the theme Survival Rougelike.(The survival part of which is a bit lacking, but if I ever update the game I will address this).
